title: License usage
content:
The License Usage page gives you a full list of license usage records per license model and product version.

Create a license usage record

  1. Go to License Models.
  2. Select the required license model record to open its General tab.
  3. In the Software coverage section, select a license metric for the product, and then add the product version as needed. We recommend that you select the highest product version. For more information, see Edit a license model.
  4. Click Save.
    This creates a license usage record on the License Usage page.

View a license usage record

A new license usage record presents you with some basic information such as the record ID and the display name of the license model.

To view more information about the latest license consumption result of the product, follow these steps:

  1. Go to the Products page, locate the product you configured, and then calculate license consumption for this product.
    You can either manually trigger a calculation task or define a scheduler to calculate product compliance periodically. See Products.
  2. After the calculation task is complete, go to the License Usage page, and then click Refresh.
    You'll see more fields populated with values from this record, including the available license points, the consumed license points, and the estimated cost for purchasing extra licenses to stay compliant.
    If no license usage data is displayed, check if you are using the Disable field rule rather than the Restrict rule for the table fields.
  3. Click the record ID to view the license details and license usage details on the General tab.
    Section Field Description
    License detail License model A classification of license assets. It is used along with the product version to initiate the license usage record.
    Product version The product version that the license covers.
    Purchased entitlements The points for purchasing full licenses directly.
    Entitlements consumed by higher versions The decrease in the number of license points when a software license is upgraded to a higher version from the current version.
    License metric The license metric configured in the license model.
    Organization compliance scope The organization compliance scope. See Create compliance reports based on organization scopes.
    Product The product that the license covers.
    Purchased upgrade entitlements

    The points that are purchased to access a newer license version on the basis of your base licenses.

    Some vendors provide upgrade license SKUs to save costs by upgrading licenses from existing older versions to target versions, which is more cost-efficient than purchasing the full license of the target version directly.
    Latest upgrade version

    The latest upgrade version, that is, the top-level version in the license upgrade matrix used in license consumption calculation.
    Usage detail Total entitlements The number of effective licenses available in the license pool.
    Consumed entitlements The number of license points consumed by software installations.
    Balance The gap between effective points and consumed points.
    Estimated cost The estimated cost calculated based on the license gap between software installations and consumed licenses.
    Calculated at The time when license consumption is calculated.
    Assigned entitlements The total number of license points that the users are authorized to use.
    Consumed entitlements The number of license points that are entitled to and have been consumed by the users.
    Unassigned entitlements consumed The total number of license points that are consumed by users who aren't authorized to use these licenses.
    Currency The currency code.
  4. To view more information about this product, click  View product in the list view toolbar. This button is disabled if the license model isn't configured with the product version.
    This will take you to the details page of this product on SAM's Products page. You can also see a list of product versions covered by the same license.

Delete a license usage record

  1. Go to License Models.
  2. Select the required license model record to open its General tab.
  3. In the Software coverage section, click Remove to delete the product version.
    This will break the link between the product version and its license.
  4. Go to the License Usage page and click Refresh.
    You'll find that the corresponding license usage record has been deleted automatically.

Related topics

  • License usage workflow
  • Customize service workflows against a license usage record
